tasks.label: optimize-images
tasks.command: node -e "(async()=>{const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');let sharp;try{sharp=require('sharp')}catch(e){console.error('sharp-missing');process.exit(42)}const dir='assets/imgs';const exts=['.png','.jpg','.jpeg'];const sizes=[480,960];function walk(p){return fs.readdirSync(p).flatMap(n=>{const full=path.join(p,n);const st=fs.statSync(full);return st.isDirectory()?walk(full):[full]});}const files=walk(dir).filter(f=>exts.includes(path.extname(f).toLowerCase()));for(const f of files){const base=f.replace(/\.(png|jpe?g)$/i,'');for(const w of sizes){const out=base+`-${w}.webp`;await sharp(f).resize({width:w,withoutEnlargement:true}).webp({quality:72}).toFile(out).catch(()=>{});} }console.log('done')} )()"
